config_name: Weekly Elimination - eliminate takeout meals except special occasions

configuration_json.formula: 100 if all days meet elimination criteria else 0

schema.description: Zero tolerance weekly elimination for Daily Takeout/Delivery Meals

metadata.recommendation_text: Eliminate takeout outside of rare/special occasions

metadata.title: Daily Takeout/Delivery Meals
metadata.overview: Regular takeout or delivery meals, especially from fast food or chain restaurants, are often higher in calories, sodium, and unhealthy fats. Reducing takeout improves dietary quality and supports health.
